pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sketching of Data via Random Subspace Embeddings // Construct sketches of data via random subspace embeddings. For more details, see the following papers. Lee, S. and Ng, S. (2022). "Least Squares Estimation Using Sketched Data with Heteroskedastic Errors," arXiv:2007.07781, accepted for presentation at the Thirty-ninth International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML 2022). Lee, S. and Ng, S. (2020). "An Econometric Perspective on Algorithmic Subsampling," Annual Review of Economics, 12(1): 4580.
